issue.message: This method should be called `getMediaItem` such that `mediaItem` can be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "executor", in androidx.media2.common.SessionPlayer.registerPlayerCallback) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
Unknown nullability; explicitly declare as `@Nullable` or `@NonNull` to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#nullability-annotations
